String.string: Hunt {@LinkCreature:5#10#toads} in {@Rgn:5001$$Tuwangi Mire}, and harvest peppercorns from their stomachs.
Hunt {@creature:5#10$$toads} and harvest peppercorns from their stomachs.
Take the carlams peppercorns to the herb gatherer, {@Creature:68#1012$$Huchu}, in {@Rgn:68001$$Pora Elinu}.
Deliver ground carlams pepper to {@Creature:84#1209$$Ganim} at {@Rgn:84101$$Kapina Camp}.
